xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 16 Micchattaniyatattika » 16.7 Pañhāvāra » 16.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 16.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Micchattaniyatattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
36.
2344Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  micchattaniyatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
2345Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  micchattaniyatā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)
2346Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  micchattaniyatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
2347Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
2348Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  aniyatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
<< 16.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāraup Ārammaṇa >>
